::: {#hero-heading style="text-align:left"}
I am a research scientist with a background in Biomedical Engineering. My primary interests include:

• [Data Visualization](resources/data_viz/ds_viz.qmd)

• [Biotechnology](resources/biox/biox.qmd)

In the [**blog**](blog.qmd) section, I hope to introduce readers to the basics of [data analysis and visualization](resources/data_viz/ds_viz.qmd) and provide a periodic summary of recent advances in [biotechnology](resources/biox/biox.qmd).
:::
